query:
-- Add new columns to lineItemGroups
ALTER TABLE lineItemGroups 
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS decorationMethod VARCHAR(100),
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;

-- Add size breakdown columns to lineItems
ALTER TABLE lineItems
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_2T INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_3T INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_4T INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_5T INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YXS INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YS INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YM INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YXL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_XS INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_S INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_M INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_L INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_2XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_3XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_4XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_5XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_6XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_Other INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS artworkUrls TEXT;

-- Create imprints table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS imprints (
  id VARCHAR(64) PRIMARY KEY,
  groupId VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  decorationMethod VARCHAR(100),
  colors INT DEFAULT 1,
  stitchCount INT,
  artworkUrl TEXT,
  setupFee DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  unitPrice DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  notes TEXT,
  sortOrder INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX imprint_group_idx (groupId)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2uKj7x2ub82QTKR.root --database NkVF5YKxaLDmpxQ4YRYdo2 --execute -- Add new columns to lineItemGroups
ALTER TABLE lineItemGroups 
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS decorationMethod VARCHAR(100),
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;

-- Add size breakdown columns to lineItems
ALTER TABLE lineItems
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_2T INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_3T INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_4T INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_5T INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YXS INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YS INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YM INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_YXL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_XS INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_S INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_M INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_L INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_2XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_3XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_4XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_5XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_6XL INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS size_Other INT DEFAULT 0,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS artworkUrls TEXT;

-- Create imprints table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS imprints (
  id VARCHAR(64) PRIMARY KEY,
  groupId VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  decorationMethod VARCHAR(100),
  colors INT DEFAULT 1,
  stitchCount INT,
  artworkUrl TEXT,
  setupFee DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  unitPrice DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  notes TEXT,
  sortOrder INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX imprint_group_idx (groupId)
);
